titles.title: Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the 180-day exclusivity period, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
This bill modifies the 180-day exclusivity period for certain generic drug manufacturers.
